A frontend application that fetches all to-do data from backend APIs
A backend API that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Functionality to create new to-do items with title, description, and due date
Functionality to edit existing to-do items including title, description, and due date
Functionality to delete to-do items permanently
Ability to mark tasks as completed or uncompleted
Filtering capability to show all, active, or completed tasks
Search functionality to find tasks by keywords in title or description
Display all to-do items in a list view with key details visible
Responsive UI design with lavender background and indigo components across all pages
Real-time synchronization between frontend and backend for all CRUD operations
Error handling for failed API requests or database connections
Validation for required fields when creating or editing tasks
Pagination or infinite scroll for browsing long lists of tasks
Package.json configured with npm run install:all and npm run dev scripts
